name: Battle Bunny Satellite Scurry!
description:
The low Earth orbit is polluted with so much debris it never ends. You are tasked with defending this satellite with your life! 

Controls

The controls are rebindable in the settings menu. Defaults are WASD for movement, mouse left button to shoot and right mouse button to launch a grenade. 
Have fun with the rope physics!

Credits

BathrobeWizard: Programming & additional Design
Helix: Programming & Additional Design
Henry: Game Design & Art
Steven: Art & additional Programming &  Font
Vikfro: Composer, sound design & additional programming. Music mixed by Babasmas (Babasmas - YouTube)

All art and music was created during the jam. (with exception of the font.)

The sounds are from Sonisss GameAudioGDC packs and one from freesound.org (https://freesound.org/people/pyro13djt/sounds/331938/) which we modified.
